sys_element_mapping.value:
Hi Trigger➛Job Record➛Job Requestor➛First name,

     I have created your job request for Trigger➛Job Record➛Short description     .  The Job Number is Trigger➛Job Record➛Number.  The due date is Trigger➛Job Record➛Due date.

 

If you have any questions, just reply to this email with your comments.

 

Thanks,
